MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 8:40 am in the LL64 postcode area of Rhosneigr following reports of a sparking overhead cable. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45 am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:46 am on 23rd December, 2020.
